item.title: How the UTXO Set Can Help Us Synchronize a Bitcoin Node
item.description: We all have encountered at some point that our Bitcoin node stops working, the raspberry fails, the disk dies, or we simply need the disk for other purposes and we end up without a Bitcoin node. In the future when we want to set up a node again we find that we have to go through the IBD (initial block download) process to synchronize the blockchain. A heavy process, that can last in many cases days and that prevents us to use the node and to connect the wallets until the node is completely synchronized.
